question: Who does the author hold responsible for the shooting spree in schools and colleges?
According to the passage, which of the following is a reason for poverty and hunger in underdeveloped countries?
What does the author mean by ‘intercepting someone’s share of daily bread’?
options: Hindering the process of marketing in underdeveloped countries by the developed countries
Denying material comfort to the Western world
Affecting the social life of those working towards material comforts only
Excess of wealth in western world while people in poorer nations struggle for survival
answer: Excess of wealth in western world while people in poorer nations struggle for survival

question: The author’s main objective in writing the passage is:
options: To explain that consumerist societies have their own drawbacks which are over blinded by its material glare
To explain how too many material comforts have improved the living standard of common man in the west
That young children should not be given access to guns and other ammunitions
All NRIs are leading unmindful, second-class lives abroad
answer: To explain that consumerist societies have their own drawbacks which are over blinded by its material glare

question: The price of a Washing Machine today is Rs. 15,000. What was its price 2 years back if the yearly rate of inflation is 20%?
options: More than Rs.10,000 but less than Rs.11,000
More than Rs.11,000 but less than Rs.12,000
answer: More than Rs.10,000 but less than Rs.11,000

question: There is triangle ABC & the sides of a triangle are 5, 12 & 13 units. The rectangle PQRS is having the same area as that of triangle ABC. What would be the difference between the perimeters of rectangle PQSR & triangle ABC if we know the width of rectangle PQRS is 10 unit?

ABC Ltd. has employed 3 kinds of professionals- Engineers, Managers & Accountants. Further, 83% Engineers are females. Also, 76% managers are females & 85% accountants are females. Among Engineers & Managers there are 79% females. Also, among Managers & accountants there are 81% females. What is the percentage of male employees in ABC Ltd?

Two persons A and B start from the opposite ends of a Corridor. They first meet 45 m from one of the ends. They continue their journey reach the other end and turn back. If they now meet 25 m from the other end, find the length of the corridor?

Riyan has 60 candies that he wants to divide among himself and his 12 friends. The candies don’t necessarily have to be divided equally, but each person must get at least 1 candy. If Arihant wants to have more candies than any of his friends, what is the difference between largest & least number of candies he could have?
Sales volume of company B increased by 20% in 2009 over 2008. What is the percentage change in the total sales volume of 2009 over the total sales volume of 2008?
